faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Free Image to Video AI
faq.description: Get answers to the most common questions about our free image to video AI technology.

questions.question: What is AI video generator and how does image to video AI work?
questions.answer: AI video generator is an advanced artificial intelligence technology that analyzes static images, photos and scripts to transform them into dynamic videos. Our image to video AI uses deep learning algorithms to understand content and generate realistic motion, creating smooth video transitions that bring your content to life.

questions.question: What types of images work best for video conversion?
questions.answer: Any high-quality image works great! Our AI excels with portraits, landscapes, product photos, artwork, and illustrations. For optimal results, use images with good lighting, clear subjects, and at least 1080p resolution. The AI automatically adapts to different styles and content types.

questions.question: How long does it take to generate a video?
questions.answer: Most videos are generated in 30-90 seconds. Processing time depends on image complexity, desired video length, and selected quality settings. Our cloud-based AI ensures consistent, fast processing without requiring powerful hardware on your device.

questions.question: Can I control the animation style and motion?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Choose from preset styles like cinematic zoom, parallax scroll, gentle sway, or dynamic movement. You can also adjust motion intensity, direction, and speed. Advanced users can specify which parts of the image to animate and control camera movements.

questions.question: What video formats and quality options are available?
questions.answer: All videos are exported as MP4 files optimized for web and social media. Choose from HD (1080p), 4K for premium quality, or compressed formats for faster sharing. Videos support multiple frame rates (24fps, 30fps, 60fps) and include optimized audio tracks.

questions.question: Is your AI video generator completely free to use?
questions.answer: Yes, our AI video generator is completely free to use. You can create unlimited videos with our image to video AI, photo to video AI and script to video AI technology. No registration or credit card required.

cases.title: Turn still images into cinematic video content
cases.description: Arting.AI transforms your static photos into immersive videos using intelligent automation. Whether it's a product showcase, a memory reel, or a brand teaser, simply drop in your images and watch them evolve into polished visual stories‚Äîcomplete with movement, effects, and audio enhancements.

cases.title: Visual storytelling with zero editing required
cases.description: Forget about complex timelines and editing software. Arting.AI eliminates the technical overhead by automatically stitching your images into cohesive, well-paced scenes. The platform handles everything‚Äîfrom visual rhythm to dynamic layout‚Äîso you can focus on your narrative, not the tools.

cases.title: A library of motion styles for every scenario
cases.description: With over 10 dynamic presentation styles to choose from, you can tailor the look and feel of your image-based video to suit your purpose. Whether you're building an ad campaign, a testimonial reel, or a personal slideshow, our templates ensure your visuals shine in the right context.

cases.title: AI-enhanced pacing, transitions, and ambiance
cases.description: Arting.AI brings your visuals to life with smooth camera movement, animated transitions, and ambient soundscapes‚Äîall powered by AI. It's designed to mimic professional video production techniques without requiring manual input.

cases.title: Branded visuals with total design alignment
cases.description: Consistency matters. That's why our image to video tool supports branded intros, outros, color schemes, and logo placements‚Äîgiving your videos a signature look, whether you're sharing one clip or building out a campaign.

cases.title: No software, no learning curve‚Äîjust upload and go
cases.description: The entire workflow runs in your browser. No plugins. No downloads. No editing skills needed. Just drag in your images, select your preferences, and generate. It's perfect for marketers, freelancers, and teams who want to produce compelling visuals without the friction.
